extension.name: ETL particle G5 Images grid
extension.author: Bertrand Pascal - En Toutes Lettres
extension.description:
Particle "Image Grid" for Gantry 5.5 v3.0 - Template Hydrogen (English version)

By En Toutes Lettres (https://www.en-toutes-lettres.fr)

Compatible Joomla 4! - Warning: Popup lightbox only now, popup Rokbox no more compatible Joomla 4!

For french version, in your folder "/templates/g5_hydrogen/custom/particles"
rename file "etl_images_grid.yaml" to "etl_images_grid_EN.yaml"
rename file "etl_images_grid_FR.yaml" to "etl_images_grid.yaml"

Don't forget to add these 2 lines

@import 'dependencies';

@import 'etl_images_grid';

in your custom CSS file, custom.scss (/templates/g5_hydrogen/custom/scss/custom.scss)

or create this file and add these 2 lines with your text editor (/templates/g5_hydrogen/custom/scss/custom.scss)
